page.title: 08 Sport & Leisure Activities
page.content:
Attleborough Cricket Club,Attleborough Football Club,Attleborough Gateway Club ,Guiltcross Club(Social),Judo club Karate Club, Ladies Football Club,Nomads,Players (Drama),Wine and Beer Circle(two),W.I.,Bingo,Bowls(4), Camera,Canine,Sub Aqua,Bridge(Tuesday).
Recreation Facilities
Rec.Ground plus 3 Play Areas and a Sports Hall.
Some Youth Activities Air Training Corps,Army Cadets, Youth Club,Girls Brigade,Junior Red Cross ,St.Marys Youth Club,Brownies(3), Guides(2),Rangers,Monday Club,Riding Club,Scouts.
